description: The auth_token middleware was moved from keystoneclient.middleware to keystonemiddleware. http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/tree/tools/config/oslo.config.generator.rc should be updated to use keystonemiddleware.
title: config generator using keystoneclient rather than middleware

commit 42464c7879046b73e660ab437d76013dafa4a108
Author: Brant Knudson <email address hidden>
Date:   Sun Sep 7 14:11:50 2014 -0500

    Fix config generator to use keystonemiddleware
    
    The auth_token middleware was moved from keystoneclient.middleware
    to keystonemiddleware. The config generator is configured to point
    to the new location.
